Name: Mission Evilguy
About the game: Mission Evilguy is a puzzle game where you make things happen at the right time at the right place. Make each level work like clockwork and reach the exit to catch Evilguy! A purely logic-based game - no quick reaction needed, no time limits, just intelligence. Easy to play for everyone No lenghty tutorials or complicated control schemes - play with just the arrow keys and one button 60 levels ranging from very easy to incredibly sophisticated Replay any previous level at any time to perfect it Full joypad support Supports 14 languages
